channel.description:
The mastermind has set sail and traveled across the globe and across the intire land of TOL to find the best, the strongest and the smartest goons to replace him while is sceming behind the scenes. Here i try and post a series of new unseen leaders and ask if anyone has an idee of making a leader as replacement of mastermind in a throne of lies game to make the unseen more versatile in games and more unpridictibel feel free to leave any suggestion or balances changes in the comments below. **Created bye NAOtheRitualist** (small balanced changed do) assassin > # The Hitman > > > > **Unseen Special** > > > > **Passive (Kevlar Armor)** - Death Immune once. If you are attacked , you will kill your attacker (does not work when your jailed). > > > > **Day Ability (Focus)** - You will become **Occupy & Redirection Immune** tonight. (2 Uses) > **Day Ability (Mission Failed)** - Select a player. Upon your death , they will become the new **Hitman** .(2 Use - Can not convert **The Prince** or **Neutrals** . You will see if your target can be converted. Once selected , you can not change the player until they die UNLESS they are **Conversion Immune** cannot target **The King** if your target becomes **The king** he will become an evil king when you die .) > > > > **Night Ability (Headshot!)** - Kill a player. (Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Killer Senses)** - Kill a player that accused you of treason. Bypasses Healing/Death Immunity. You will appear not suspicious to **Investigative** abilities tonight.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **The Blue Dragon** and any **Neutrals** that seek you harm.* > > > > * Member Count when **The Hitman** is **The Leader** : 1 member. > * Unique Mechanic when **The Hitman** is **The Leader** : Players won't be converted **The Assassin** if there is only 1 unseen meber left
**The master assassin**
**Unseen special**
**Passive (Loyal)**: Immune to most occupation and rederection **Passive (protective)** All investigate abilities against **The Assassin** will be prevented as long as you are allive.
**Day Ability (Cover tracks)** **The Assassin's** abilities will not count as visiting tonight (1 use) **Day Ability (Dirty Work)** If you are the only unseen member left become **The Assassin** tonight.
**Night Ability (Recruit)** Convert a player to **The unseen** tonight. (3 uses) **Night Ability (Train)** Target a Unseen member you will train them tonight giving them a buff depending on wich you choose (1 day cooldown).
* Mind training- The player becomes **occupy** and **rederection** immune but he will be occupied the next night bypasses occcupy immunity (1 use)
* Endurence training- The player becomes death immune but will bleed out if he is not healed in 1 night (1 use)
* Efficiency training- The player will gain 1 addition charge of all his abilities but will be unable to use those abilities for the next day and night - 1 use
* Lethality training - **Assassinate** is replaced by **Searing strike** but **Assassinate** cannot be used the night this is used and **Searing Strike** cannot be used the night after this ability is used -1 use (**Searing Strike** is not passed on to the next **Assassin** and this ability will fail if the target does not have the **Assassinate** ability **Searing Strike** - Kill a target player bypasses night immunity
**The Unseen** can only have 2 member while **The Master Assassin** is the leader (passives are bound to players not to **The Assassin**.)
